p: Emtricitabine is a nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor which is used in AIDS treatment [ 78, 79]. It blocks the reverse transcription process of HIV by inhibiting reverse transcriptase and can also effectively inhibit hepatitis B virus (HBV) reverse transcription process [ 77, 80]. It has been reported that the combination of emtricitabine and denofovir alafenamide in clinical trial for the treatment of COVID-19 was applied with great therapeutic effects [ 32].
